about_the_game: Get a taste for what it takes to be a Certified Swinger. Learn how to traverse the rainforest as a chameleon swinging by your tongue from tree to tree.
detailed_description: Get a taste for what it takes to be a Certified Swinger. Learn how to traverse the rainforest as a chameleon swinging by your tongue from tree to tree.
name: Swingers Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Play as a chameleon in this cute, precision platformer to traverse the rainforest swinging by your tongue. Learn movement mechanics and optimize your routes to reach the end in the quickest time possible - if at all.
